title: Man Superhero
description:
A man who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people and is dedicated to protecting the public. Generally depicted as wearing a colorful domino mask and a cape.

The Supervillain is the nemesis of this emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man superhero emoji stands with heroic poise, his costume rendered in vibrant, eye-catching colors with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading.  His determined expression, framed by a subtle smirk, conveys a sense of courage and optimism, ready to tackle any challenge.  The smooth gradients and realistic lighting on Apple‚Äôs design bring this symbol of strength and empowerment to life, perfect for messages of support or celebrating achievements.
